actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize R. Edward Bellamy, doctor of philosophy, a retired officer of the Commissioned Corps of the United States Public Health Services, to accept employment by the Canadian Department of Agriculture.

summary.text: Authorizes R. Edward Bellamy, doctor of philosophy, a retired officer of the Commissioned Corps of the United States Public Health Services, to accept employment by the Canadian Department of Agriculture.

titles.title: A bill to authorize R. Edward Bellamy, doctor of philosophy, a retired officer of the Commissioned Corps of the United States Public Health Services, to accept employment by the Canadian Department of Agriculture.
